Title: Optimizing Oracle & SQL Server in the Cloud: A Practical Framework for High-Performance Database Management on AWS & Azure
Abstract: Cloud databases drive robotics and automation. Learn how to optimize Oracle & SQL Server with AWS & Azure tools improving performance, scalability, and efficiency while preparing for serverless and AI-driven futures.

Title: Agentic Intelligence in Robotics: Multi-Agent AI for Scalable, Decision-Ready Systems
Abstract: Explore how robotics and multi-agent AI converge: agentic systems that decompose tasks, orchestrate intelligence, and deliver decision-ready insights. Learn how these architectures scale autonomy, ensuring robots move beyond data retrieval to real strategic reasoning.

Title: Strategic Role of AI-Powered Recommendation Systems in Shaping Industries
Abstract: Discover how AI-powered recommendation systems are transforming from simple suggestion engines into strategic infrastructure driving personalization, efficiency, and competitive advantage across industries from e-commerce to robotics-enabled marketplaces.

Company1: Spire Integrated Solutions, MIT Sloan School of Management, USA
Title: AI + Robotics in Supply Chains: A Proven Framework for Automation, ROI, and Scalability
Abstract: Discover how AI and robotics are transforming supply chains into high-performance, automated ecosystems. Learn a proven framework to boost ROI, improve agility, and scale operations using machine learning, IoT, and intelligent robotics backed by real-world case studies.

Title: From Code to Coordination: How Systems Strategy Supercharges Robotics
Abstract: Robots don’t scale themselves. Brandi Cox shares how system strategy supports robotics teams by reducing chaos, simplifying ops, and aligning automation with real-world workflows—no burnout, just results.

Title: DO-178C in Multicore Avionics: Certification Paths for Electric Aircraft
Abstract: Discover how electric aircraft projects are overcoming multicore certification hurdles under DO-178C. Learn proven strategies to cut delays, ensure safety, and accelerate compliance vital for the future of robotic and electric aviation.

Title: Automation for Equitable and Resilient Public Services: Cross-Sector Insights
Abstract: Discover how automation and robotics are revolutionizing public services driving resilience, equity, and 99.999% uptime across healthcare, legal, and utilities. Learn proven strategies to cut costs, boost access, and build trust in the digital age.

Title: SmartSAN AI: Enabling Zero-Downtime Storage Migrations with Robotics-Driven Intelligence
Abstract: Discover how SmartSAN AI brings robotics-inspired intelligence to storage migrations, turning hours of downtime into seconds. With near-perfect accuracy and automation, it delivers seamless, zero-disruption transformations for mission-critical enterprise systems.

JobTitle1: Group Director, Ecommerce Product, Kelley School of Business
Title: Deep Learning in Robotics: Driving Efficiency and Intelligent Automation
Abstract: Discover how deep learning is revolutionizing robotics with real-time vision, predictive automation, and human-robot interaction. Learn practical strategies to build intelligent, scalable, and high-performance robotic systems powered by AI.

Title: AI-Driven Infrastructure for Robotics: Smart Network & Storage Optimization
Abstract: Learn how AI transforms network & storage infrastructure for robotics - from robot fleet coordination to real-time sensor data processing, covering practical ML techniques for autonomous systems infrastructure.

JobTitle1: Sr. Manager, IT Infrastructure & Productivity Apps
Title: Securing Robot Networks for the Quantum Era
Abstract: Quantum computers could soon compromise robotic systems. Learn how to secure your robot networks with post-quantum cryptography, using NIST standards and real-world case studies without breaking real-time performance.

Title: Building Smarter Robots: Memory and Interface Architectures for Real-Time Autonomy
Abstract: Explore how fast memory and interconnects like LPDDR6, CXL 3.1, and HBM4 are fueling real-time AI in robotics from edge autonomy to multi-agent coordination. Build robots that think and act faster, smarter, and more efficiently.

Title: Smart Non-Woven Surfaces: IoT-Enabled Materials Engineering for Sustainable, Connected Environments.
Abstract: Discover how a sustainable, PVC-free non-woven surface platform integrates IoT, sensors, and automation. Validated across ASTM, FINAT, and CDPH standards, it enables smart robotics environments with barrier coatings, adhesive tech, and embedded connectivity.

JobTitle1: Lead Member of Technical Staff at Salesforce
Title: Distributed Robotics Systems: Sharding for Multi-Robot Fleet Management
Abstract: Learn to build fault-tolerant robot fleet architectures using cloud sharding principles. Achieve 99.99% uptime for distributed robotics systems through intelligent zone-based coordination and automated failover strategies

Title: Architecting for Agility: Loose Coupling for Scalable Robotics Systems
Abstract: Discover how loose coupling transforms robotics systems enabling faster innovation, seamless integration, and resilient performance. Learn real-world patterns and tools powering agile, scalable robotics architectures in a rapidly evolving tech landscape.

Title: AI-Powered Embedded Systems: Revolutionizing Robotics Performance and Autonomous Decision-Making
Abstract: Unlock the secret to lightning-fast robot brains! Discover how AI-embedded firmware is creating robots that think in microseconds, slash power consumption by 40%, and operate autonomously in the most extreme environments. Real Mars Rover tech meets cutting-edge ML—your robots will never be the same!

Title: Demystifying Compliance-by-Design: Architecting Regulatory-Resilient Robotics and Financial Systems
Abstract: Robotics in finance is under mounting regulatory pressure. Learn how compliance-by-design powered by audit trails, bi-temporal data, and adaptive workflows transforms compliance from a burden into a structural advantage for resilient automation.

Title: Harnessing Advanced Analytics and AI to Transform Clinical Robotics and Healthcare
Abstract: Discover how advanced analytics, AI, and robotics are transforming healthcare. From real-time insights to future-ready innovations, this session reveals how to build scalable, compliant systems that improve patient outcomes and redefine clinical care.

Title: AI-Driven Networking for Robotics: Building Scalable, Intelligent, and Resilient Systems
Abstract: Discover how AI is revolutionizing network engineering for robotics. Learn how protocols, scale, and machine learning converge to create intelligent, resilient networks that power the next generation of autonomous systems.

Title: Driving $30M in Supply Chain Efficiency: Analytics-Driven Automation at Kellogg’s
Abstract: Discover how Kellogg’s unlocked $30M+ in supply chain savings by fusing real-time analytics with automation. Learn how data-driven intelligence can optimize manufacturing, boost efficiency, and transform operations at scale.

Title: API Gateways at Scale: Data-Driven Advances for Cloud, Serverless, and Edge
Abstract: Discover how next-gen API gateways power robotics and automation with lightning-fast scalability, edge performance, and AI-driven intelligence. Learn real-world metrics and strategies to cut latency, boost resilience, and secure millions of API calls in cloud and edge systems.

JobTitle1: Principal Engineer - Amazon Deliveries; Last Mile Transportation
Company1: Amazon, Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani
Title: Unified AI Data Governance for Scalable, Compliant Robotics in Modern Banking
Abstract: Discover how a Unified AI Data Governance Framework can supercharge robotics in banking cutting AI deployment time by 30%, ensuring global compliance, and enabling real-time oversight across massive, fast-moving data ecosystems.

Title: AI-Driven Emergency Response: Cloud, Robotics, and Predictive Analytics
Abstract: Discover how AI, robotics, and cloud-powered predictive analytics are transforming disaster response. From real-time data to autonomous systems, learn how smarter emergency frameworks can save lives and build resilient cities.

Company1: Big Data Engineer (Azure), Wayne State University
Title: From Data Streams to Autonomous Actions: Embedding AI Agents in Robotic Decision Pipelines
Abstract: Discover how embedding AI agents directly into robotic data pipelines transforms raw sensor streams into autonomous, real-time decision engines, boosting speed, accuracy, and adaptability across industries.
